website_summaries.verdict: Coolest designed TIKI tabletop on the market.
pros: Pineapple cap covers wick when not in use, making it appear like a stylish outdoor accessory instead of a torch
Earns bonus points because they are small enough to bring along on a picnic
Scores big on heaviness – no need to worry about them tipping over
cons: Initially, until the wick burns down a little, the cap doesn't fit perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Festive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great table torchs - actually a bit larger than I imagined but that's great, they hhold more fuel that way! Lots of compliments, they're so cute. One note - the wick burns super hot. I've noticed lots of black burn-off from them. Next time I use them I plan to adjust the wick to a lower position so there is very little wick exposed to see if that helps. I also recommend blowing them out before replacing the top piece as it does get a bit black/charred if you use it to extinguish the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Molly S

customer_reviews.title: Broke from heat
customer_reviews.text: Two broke off from the heat less than a minute after lighting it. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, so pretty, but intense flame
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and the quality is better than expected they are a little bit light which made me nervous, but when you fill it with the fuel it adds more weight to it so it was good. The only thing was that the flame was so intense and turning smoky and black a bit, that we had to take them off the table right away because the smoke & flame was way too intense and was immediately bothering everybody which was pretty disappointing. I guess maybe I’ll have to pull the wicks down even further although i had already done this. Maybe for table top you really need a smaller thinner wick.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm having an outdoor wedding. In Florida. My theme is gold pineapples and these are PERFECT functional decorations. They're heavy and sturdy feeling. Update, its after my wedding. Over half of them just broke. The top part holding the wick is apparently paper thin and over half the pineapples just broke after just one use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Domenique

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful... They are made of Glass as an FYI.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little Pineapple Torches. They look amazing and really do light up the night. My only hesitation is that they are made of Glass so they need to be treated with the utmost safety. Dont put them on side tables or anywhere that a kid or dog could inadvertently knock them off and have them break, spill and potentially be a big fire hazard. We had ours out this past weekend and everyone loved them until i realized this exact thing and I ended up moving them to the center of the dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Purchase a different model lamp to save headache!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality control! I had to send back because the pineapples had chipped paint on a majority of the tips, it was still functional, but I paid for a new products so it should not have appeared secondhand. The replacement product I was sent ended up being defective as well. Two of the three pineapples actually broke off at the top that screwed into the black wick holder. After sending back the second order, I soon saw this same product on a significant clearance sale at the biggest brick and mortar retailer in the US. Seems like the issues were not isolated.
customer_reviews.author: Javantavius

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneously Broke
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I received these torches because they look very fun and would fit in great on my patio. I filled and used one, which went well. The one strange thing is that the top of the pineapple is just the cover so when in use, they do not resemble a pineapple. The next time I went to use the rest, two of the three glass bottoms broke off at the neck. These two torches were sitting unmolested then suddenly just shattered off. I like the look but there must be something fawed in the design where they spontaneously break.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute tabletop tikis
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look on our outdoor table. However, when they are lit, there is a lot more smoke than expected, even though the wicks are short. It was hard to have a meal with these on the table while eating. We were hoping to use them to keep the bugs away, but mostly it kept the people away 😂. We had to move them off the table to finish our meal and get the smoke out of our eyes. If you want them for decorative bug deterrents, I recommend you don't put them on the table you are eating on!
customer_reviews.author: Jill George

customer_reviews.title: Love these pineapple tikis!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tabletop tikis, and so do my kids. They burn very brightly, with a much more robust flame than most of my actual tiki torches. They’re easy to light and easy to extinguish (with the accompanying, metal pineapple tops). They do get very black and smudgy on the top portion of the pineapple from the burnt wicks, but I could probably clean that off with cleaning fluid if I wanted to take the time. I will probably order more of these before summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Love these torches. They are adorable, and go well with just about any decor. Usually, the "bitefighter" oil works pretty well to keep the mosquitoes away during the summer, but I just think they are extra virulent this year. Even though, this is still a super cute addition to our back yard, and we will always use them. Just be careful, because they are fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look but leaks from wick
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and not expensive, but leaks fluid from wick and ends up on table. Happened with all three
customer_reviews.author: jzd5032

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple table top tiki torches.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them for my wife. She loves pineapple things. They are sturdy and made of thick glass. I know it’s glass as we dropped one on our concrete patio and it shattered into a million pieces. Quite a bummer. These are fantastic little table top tiki torches. She loves them and they are a hit with guests. Great value as you get 3 for around $20.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. They look cute but the quality is terrible. After filling them half way with tiki torch fluid. they leaked all over my outdoor table ruining it. Every one of them leaked and are covered in oil. Horrible design and poor quality. Safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Shellegrace

customer_reviews.title: Look great and seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great! I lit them for an hour or so and they seem to hold up well although the flame was really high so I’m planning to trim the wick a little. They are very cute and seem really sturdy. I’ll do my best to update if I have any issues with them in the coming weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy, prone to breakage.
customer_reviews.text: The torches looked fine upon inspection, but when I refilled one, the threaded neck broke clean off inside the cap that holds the wick. Unfortunately the torch waited to break until the return period had passed. The other two seem to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: One of these leaked made a mess would have given a better review but no way to contact anyone to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Clarinda

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Bugs
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and hold a lot of bug fuel. The bugs do not like them! We bought the fuel that seems to go with them. Last night we were sitting outside and the bugs showed up. We lit 2 of the tikis and within minutes the bugs were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken GOBLU

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Super CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! These are super cute and really well made. They are really heavy and are easily left out on the patio without any concern of them blowing over. They look like great table decorations, then you take the lid off and BOOM, they are totally functional too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Might be not heavy enough to stand a strong wind.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. My wife loves the pineapple design. The only thing bad is when the repellent spill on it, it’s not easy to swipe it off. And because it is in white. We have to clean up the surface every time after we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai chiu

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & Effective!
customer_reviews.text: These pack a big punch. They're not that large, but their flame is impressive! Sick near one, and skeetos will vanish. They are super cute too! Would recommend these for anyone looking to enjoy the outdoors and wanting to keep pests away.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Small, space saving, and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small picnic area in the backyard. They are slightly smaller than expected but works out better in my opinion for the small table we have. Tiki Bitefighter fuel in it only took a few seconds to soak the wick. The covers/pineapple crown should keep these from water contamination better than the bamboo ones we've had previously. Seem to be well made and adds a nice touch to any setting! Conveniently we have some potted pineapple plants in our patio area too so it fits right in!
customer_reviews.author: Ty and CC

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: Pineapple lovers rejoice! These look even better in person than on the Amazon picture. I can recommend without hesitation. Fee solid, decent weight to them, work just like they're supposed to and they make a nice accent addition to patio or where you plan to use them.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Such pretty table torches!
customer_reviews.text: These table torches are great! I feel like I got a great deal on what I paid for these, especially considering there are 3 included and the quality is very nice. I've been using them regularly and they put out a lot of light when lite and using citronella keeps the bugs away. I do have them in a covered porch so I expect the color and paint will last for a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: crook3d

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and useful! They hold a lot of the tiki lighter fluid, so they burn a long time. We have had ours for a while and haven’t had to refill them. They are very effective and easy to put out.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Weippert

customer_reviews.title: Small but very good looking. Dig the look and they come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Small but very good looking. Dig the look and they come with wick. They will make a great addition to backyard summers lighting needs. Added a spontaneous video shortly after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Roe1577

customer_reviews.title: This are awesome for deck and patio
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit larger than I expected and they are quality. They seem like they would take alot of effort to brake. I have dropped them and nothing happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: joshwithanh

customer_reviews.title: Dont stain
customer_reviews.text: I was worried they would get marked up with black and not look great after a few uses. We have used them all summer and they still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Last Name

customer_reviews.title: Fun decor/powerful flame!
customer_reviews.text: These look great as tabletop decor indoor our outdoor when not using them as torches. I would not use them under a covered patio as the flame and smoke went pretty high, ( we may have oversoaked the wick?) but they make for a dramatic ambiance out by our pool when we have guests.
customer_reviews.author: Montie Krumnow

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Perfect for any back porch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my back porch and they are perfect! They look adorable on any table and really do help keep the mosquito away. They are a good price for the quality and they gave a good touch to my backyard setting.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Conn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful when lit
customer_reviews.text: First off love the look. My only issue was one came broken. :( overall the look amazing on my deck minus the one that came in broken.
customer_reviews.author: TRUDY MILLS

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy to use. The flame does get very large. It doesn't keep all mosquitoes away as most items don't.
customer_reviews.author: sepk

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Very practical design and these look nice on our tables around the pool. Keeps the bugs away too!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Totally love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these super cute great quality and last a while. Looks great out on my patio. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Tiki torches
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a friend who loves all things pineapple. She enjoyed them very much and the pack of 3 is cheaper than buying them individually in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Glass Pineapple Tiki Torches
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but one pineapple arrived broken. I love these tho bc they look fancy & decorative but serve a purpose! With the Tiki Brand Bite Fighter fluid, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to be awesome conversation pieces to use for the summer but guess what... the first time we lit one up the neck broke. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kryzak

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Just as pictured. Fill with fuel, light wick and done! Cheaper here, have at Walmart for $7 each!
customer_reviews.author: Stayathomemommy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, great for putting citronella oil in. I would worry they would break in high winds as they are ceramic. Good buy. I kept 2 and gave one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Canya62

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking on the table & did an excellent job. Kept all the pesky bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: JenaFay

customer_reviews.title: Great table top torches
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I get a lot of compliments. I live in South Florida and keep these filled with a citronella oil on my patio table. It helps to reduce mosquitoes and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my patio and I have gotten tons of compliment on how cute they are.
customer_reviews.author: Etak611

customer_reviews.title: Cheap=Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They are cute from a distance. There were quite a few defects on the lids, and the one came completely broken. I didn't realize until I had already unpackaged and filled the first two with citronella.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Expect Compliments
customer_reviews.text: These are my second set that I got just for my camper. I always receive compliments and they look good wherever I use them. Only drawback is the wick is hard to regulate.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kitamura

customer_reviews.title: Great table top tiki
customer_reviews.text: These look great with the lids on and work great! Just fill it up, set the wick to about 1/2” and you’re ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Michael I

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Two out of three torches broke on first use. After filling them and screwing on the top, I placed the golden “pineapple” top on and the threaded part snapped instantly
customer_reviews.author: Colin Ager

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Cutest tiki fluid holders ever. Shipped fast. Easy to open to add fluid. Burns for quite a while. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Julee Temple

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple tikki
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I needed a tiki torch and three for a reasonable price. It’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It look so good on our patio and keep the mosquitos away in the south.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Looks great. Works great. I put bug defense tiki torch fluid in them.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Soto

customer_reviews.title: 2 broke immediately after putting top on with liquid inside
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 busted immediately following putting the lid on after filling the bottles up. So I only have one that works. I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Peskuski

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tiki lamps! Had them out all summer and they still look new!
customer_reviews.author: The Schmuks

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are so cute and work pretty well to keep bugs away if you are a mosquito magnet like I am. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cute table top accent
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo cute and work great! But they’re cheaper at Target here in Washington. $5 a piece but I’d buy them again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lavelle Pilon

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: These little table top torches are perfect outdoor decor for summer nights. Amal but mighty!
customer_reviews.author: jrmp13

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE outdoor decor pieces
customer_reviews.text: Really loving my Tiki Pineapples on my patio set - they look perfect for decoration but are also fun to light up at night! Makes me feel like I have a little piece of the tropics right in my backyard :)
customer_reviews.author: JulieBanks85

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and large
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and larger than they seem. Will be prefect for citronella oil in the patio during summer
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lu

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it looked around my pool for my end of year party for my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when they arrived but as I was putting the wick in after filling the top broke in the lid
customer_reviews.author: Deloris Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: One item was broken upon arrival. I couldn’t be bothered to call for a replacement having to pack up them all up for one broken out of three. Other than that, they are super cute and go great with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple paradise
customer_reviews.text: Bang for my buck! Love them. They’re as useful as they are decorative
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price, cheaper than Lowe's
customer_reviews.text: these were perfect, look good and loved that they came in a pack of three.
customer_reviews.author: Rzasac

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to patio
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. No surprises. Had to buy the fuel. Works great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke before I could tighten the lid after filling. Not sure i can return since the other 2 are lit.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple theme this year! 🍍
customer_reviews.text: Love this set on our outdoor tables and buffet! They are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Cutest way to keep the mosquitos away!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my mini pineapples. Great on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable! Long burning and really add to the patio vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy these lanterns. They dress up the tables outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile product. I didn’t screw it on super tight and after filling the pineapple and screw in the top back on it snapped at the neck.. they definitely need to be a little thicker
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So cute !
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable and perfect for interring I love them so much
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Order
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and didn't received them , I received normal ones Not pineapple.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor decor
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great quality, exactly as expected, sturdy for outdoor use/storage.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with these tabletop torches
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and decorative for my patio. Wanted something nice to fill and keep the bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: SurfCityGal

customer_reviews.title: Love love!!
customer_reviews.text: I already owned one and loved it so much I ordered more to go around my pool and campsite when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clark

customer_reviews.title: defective patio table top torch
customer_reviews.text: I just started using these torches and when I went to refill them one of the units top broke off so I am down to 2 of these. And they're not cheap I expected better quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Fun Tikis
customer_reviews.text: Loved these portable tiki lights. You can set them around and they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: D. She

customer_reviews.title: First one cracked
customer_reviews.text: First one cracked 10 minutes after lighting. 2nd one is lit now.....😬
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my friend's new lake house. Perfect and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these- they sell at Walmart but they’re actually cheaper here especially buying multiple! Great decoration- put out good light too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good size and weight is good so won’t blow away
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Good size and weight is good so won’t blow away
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brantley

customer_reviews.title: White with gold pineapple topper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tiki table top torches for the patio. Simple design color scheme works for the patio lounge area.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening the box.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except one of the three was broken. I do not want to return all three to get new ones....I want to use them now. So basically I got 2 for the price of three:(
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Glad shattered in a second after opening.
customer_reviews.text: I tried opening them and all 3 broke at the top where you screw the top on. Just cracked as if the glass was to fragile to screw the piece it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Schnepf

customer_reviews.title: Broken after first use
customer_reviews.text: One of the pineapples broke while filling with oil for first use. Can’t screw on top. Disappointed since it is brand name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a summer party and turned out using them all summer! Works great. The flames were pretty tall so just be aware!

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look! However, the neck on one broke at the base after only two days. :/

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: These are even nicer in person! Elegant citronella oil burners! Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail and it's broken!!!! I was so excited for these and I can't believe I got something like this

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well!! I have 4 friends that bought them after me too. They also look so cute in the tables. Very happy with them!!!

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: They came carefully packaged and they are super cute. Can't wait to use them on my new deck!

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but fragile
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice but are fragile. The tops have broken on two already.

product_meta.title: TIKI Brand Pineapple Glass Table Torch, White (Set of 3)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteTIKI Brand Pineapple Paradise Glass Table Torch White/Gold - 3pk. 6.5-Inch Tall. 6 hour burn time. 3 attractive pineapple table torches will add a touch of fun and glamour to your outdoor setting.
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR DÉCOR: Entertain outdoors in style with this set of 3 decorative glass table torches. This lovely table torch adds a fashionable and friendly touch to any outdoor décor or table setting.

VERSATILE & LONG LASTING: These torches feature integrated snuffers to extinguish the flame at the end of the evening. These torches hold 13.5 oz. of torch fuel each for 5+ hours of burn time per fill
PERSONAL PARADISE: We can help you create an outdoor paradise with our easy-to-use, long lasting TIKI products, designed in a wide variety of styles to suit any yard, garden, lawn, patio, or porch
STYLISH INNOVATION: We continue to innovate outdoor lighting with stylish designs & products like our mosquito repellent torch fuels, adjustable flame Table Torches & Citronella candle buckets
BEST OF THE BACKYARD: For over 60 years we've made outdoor torches to illuminate your yard or garden along with candles, wicks, stakes, stands, torch fuel & other accessories to light your landscape

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars340 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
